Uses of Interface
ray.rage.rendersystem.RenderWindow

  • Packages that use RenderWindow 
    Package Description
    ray.rage.game  
    ray.rage.rendersystem  
    ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4  

    • Uses of RenderWindow in ray.rage.game

      Methods in ray.rage.game with parameters of type RenderWindow 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.setupCameras(SceneManager sm, RenderWindow rw)
      This is where the game creates cameras, connects them to scene-nodes, specifies into which viewports their contents will be drawn, and so on.
      protected void BaseGame.setupWindowViewports(RenderWindow rw) 
      protected abstract void AbstractGame.setupWindowViewports(RenderWindow rw)
      This is where the game logically divides a render-window's real-estate into viewports.

    • Uses of RenderWindow in ray.rage.rendersystem

      Methods in ray.rage.rendersystem that return RenderWindow 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderWindow RenderSystem.createRenderWindow(boolean fullScreen)
      Creates a render-window with the current display-mode of the default screen-device.
      RenderWindow RenderSystem.createRenderWindow(java.awt.DisplayMode displayMode, boolean fullScreen)
      Creates a render-window with the specified display-mode.
      RenderWindow RenderSystem.getRenderWindow()
      Gets the render-window created by this.

    • Uses of RenderWindow in ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4

      Classes in ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4 that implement RenderWindow 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GL4RenderWindow
      A concrete implementation of the render-window interface for a GL4RenderSystem.
      Methods in ray.rage.rendersystem.gl4 that return RenderWindow 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderWindow GL4RenderSystem.createRenderWindow(boolean fullScreen)

      RenderWindow GL4RenderSystem.getRenderWindow()
